Package pLaunchControl

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Knob
    A logical representation of the physical knob in the MIDI controller.
    LaunchController
    A wrapper for the MIDI controller Novation LaunchControl.
    After instantiating a LaunchController, you can use the following events (*) to track changes to knobs and pads:
    LedConstants
    Hexadecimal values representing the possible combinations of color and intensity of pads in the MIDI controller.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    KNOBS
    The 16 knobs of the controller.
    PADMODE
    Modes of operation of pads.
    PADS
    The 8 pads of the controller.
